file_content.text: You say where and we'll be there, Commander.
Did you see the way that Imp glared at me?
Admiral Aygo's doing the best he can, but with our limited resources... things are tough.
We can't do everything on our own. We need more people or better equipment.
Slept a full eight hours last night. First time since Coruscant.
That Private Schor is a piece of work. Good shot, though.
Supplies are coming in daily. Brings a smile to my face.
The Imps aren't so bad once you get to know them... and aren't shooting at you.
Kinda hoping this alliance isn't just a temporary thing. We're doing more than the Republic ever did.
